home.mapDescription: Visualize hourly air quality information with a single click, over our growing network across African cities

intro.title: The CLEAN-Air Network
intro.subtitle: An African-led, multi-regional network
intro.description: bringing together a community of practice for air quality solutions and air quality management across Africa.

acronym.fullName: "Championing Liveable urban Environments through African Networks for Air"
acronym.description: The network brings together stakeholders and researchers in air quality management to share best practices and knowledge on developing and implementing air quality management solutions in African cities.
acronym.invitation: Are you an organization or individual interested in air quality in Africa?

mission.subtitle: Mission
mission.title: The CLEAN-Air Mission
mission.description: To strengthen regional networks for sustained partnerships and enable partners to co-develop solutions that enhance the capacity for air quality monitoring, modelling and management across cities in Africa.

membership.subtitle: Membership
membership.title: A Synergy for Air Quality in Africa
membership.description: The network comprises a diverse stakeholder landscape including research organisations, city and national governments, the private sector, development partners, and individuals who are championing the air quality agenda in African cities.
membership.invitation: Are you an organization or individual interested in air quality in Africa? We welcome you to join the CLEAN-Air Network.

enhancingCapacity.title: Enhancing Regional Capacity
enhancingCapacity.description: Dedicated to improving capacity in air quality monitoring, modeling, data management, and access through scaling up of ongoing localized initiatives in African Cities.

collaboration.title: Collaboration and Awareness
collaboration.description: Committed to fostering a deeper understanding, awareness, and appreciation of air quality issues through evidence-informed and participatory advocacy, and knowledge sharing.

cleanAirSolutions.title: Clean Air Solutions for Cities
cleanAirSolutions.description: CLEAN-Air network is a nexus for developing tangible and contextual clean air solutions and frameworks for African cities.

joinNetwork.title: Increase the visibility of your work in African Cities. Access a pool of experts.

registerEvent.title: Are you organising an event/activity and you would want it featured?

footer.tagline: Clean air for all African Cities.

dialog.heading: Our growing network in Africa
dialog.subheading: View AirQo developments in your country
dialog.noCountries: No countries available at the moment.

hero.title: Built in Africa for African cities.
hero.description: Designed, manufactured, and calibrated to measure ambient air quality and optimized to suit the African context.

designedForAfrica.title: Designed for Africa
designedForAfrica.paragraph1: The monitors are optimized with capabilities to cope with challenges like extreme weather conditions, including high levels of dust and heat, typical to the context of African cities.
designedForAfrica.paragraph2: Powered by either mains or solar, the device is optimized to work in settings characterized by unreliable power and intermittent internet connectivity. It runs on a 2G GSM network configuration for IoT SIM cards.

mobileMonitoring.title: Mobile Monitoring
mobileMonitoring.paragraph1: The monitors are easy to install and can be placed on static buildings or motorcycle taxis locally called 'boda-bodas' to improve spatial coverage and revolution.
mobileMonitoring.paragraph2: Air quality data collection using motorcycle taxis has real potential for high-resolution air quality monitoring in urban spaces. Mobile monitoring enables us to close the gaps and spatial limitations of fixed static monitoring.

monitorsInAfrica.title: 250+ Air quality monitors installed in 8 major African cities
monitorsInAfrica.paragraph1: To effectively tackle air pollution, access to data and contextual evidence is important to show the scale and magnitude of air pollution.
monitorsInAfrica.paragraph2: We're providing an end-to-end air quality solution in major African cities leveraging the locally built low-cost monitors and existing expertise to advance air quality management, and implicitly, air quality improvement in these African cities.

installationGuide.title: Installation
installationGuide.description: This guide includes instructions and manuals on how to easily activate, install, operate and manage the Binos Air Quality Monitors.
